name: hibp-local
description: Locally search the Have I Been Pwned database for compromised passwords
author: Valentino Stoll <v@codenamev.com>

scripts.import: source .env && docker run -it --link hibp_percona mysql -h hibp_percona -P 3306 -u $MYSQL_USER -p $MYSQL_PASSWORD hibp_local < ./import.sql
